transcripts.text: Hello there, this is Steve Trueblue of the Layman's Gnosis website, TrueblueHealer.com.  What I have for you today is a quick dot joining exercise because a lot of people are getting very alarmed about Donald Trump's seemingly odd behaviour, wanting to use the military to vaccinate people in America.  I think that's a wrong conclusion.  I'm going to point out to you a couple of things.  to the effect that it is a ruse.  He absolutely needs to declare another state of emergency around Christmas time because the earliest one from the previous one, 21st December last year, do you remember that executive order for human trafficking, pedophilia and money laundering?  He was going after the deep state.  It's running out around Christmas time and that's why he's horrified Dr Fauci by saying a vaccine will be delivered by the military at Christmas time.  The lack of the vaccine available at that time will be the reason to declare a continuing state of emergency.  Now, why is there a need for a continued state of emergency for 18 months?  Well, the answer is the Obama administration is finally facing serious indictment for crimes as high as treason.  And a very current activist judge, one Emmett Sullivan, has proven that the Obama administration will never get a fair trial on the mainland of America.  So it is in fact Gitmo where it has to be done with military judges.  That's the gist of it.  The business about vaccines and Donald Trump going from house to house with squads of soldiers, vaccinating everyone, holding them down, make sure they get it in the neck and everything.  That's not going to happen because Donald Trump is not really a vaccine fanatic at all.  He's cautiously pro-vaccine because he has a son, Barron, who may have suffered some vaccine damage.  Donald Trump is a bit suspicious of some vaccines and Dr.  Judy Mikovits is hopefully going to tell us soon in the American Senate.  So I think that's really the plan.  When there's no vaccine, it's going to be another emergency around Christmas time.  And that's the anniversary of the first date of emergency.  December 21, 22, 23, it might happen or just before that.  And I really think it's triggered by this Emmet Sullivan, the activist judge, who will not allow natural justice to occur.  And there seems to be almost no way to stop activist judges in America upsetting the simplest courses of natural justice.  But that's my explanation.  I don't think we should get too concerned about Donald Trump putting vaccines and the military together, end of the year, that sort of thing.  I think it's just a ruse to justify a new state of emergency beginning around Christmas time this year.  So that leaves only Justin Trudeau, who's just proving that he really is the son of Fidel Castro, admiring all things totalitarian and communistic, he wants to bring the Chinese military into Canada to test their vaccines on Canadians.  Well, they've got a very bad track record testing on Chinese people, have the Chinese military.  There are many, many vaccine-damaged reports from China, you can see mothers wailing about it.  They get nothing, no compensation, no hospital care, nothing for their brain damaged children.  There's many, many cases of it.  I've seen the videos.  But that's all I have to tell you now.  And it's basically, don't be too alarmed about Donald Trump's putting the words vaccine and military in the same paragraph when he's talking, because I think it's really just a ruse.  That's all it is to justify a new state of emergency for the next 12 months when Christmas comes around again.  So that's all we have today, gang.  Ta-ta.
